title: IntGenomicsLab/lrsomatic pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

bam_tumor.errorMessage: Bam file of tumor sample must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bam'

bam_normal.errorMessage: Bam file of normal sample must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bam'

platform.errorMessage: Method must be one of the following: 'pb' or 'ont'

sex.errorMessage: Biological sex must be either 'male' or 'female'

fiber.errorMessage: Specifiy (y/n) if sample has had fiberseq performed
